backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no functions.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing a background-image replacement feature and its components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: List of short summaries for all frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining romantic-themed CSS variables and applying global background and text rules.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point containing a root div and script loading main.tsx.
frontend/README-assets.md: Guide explaining how to replace the three generated background images and notes that background music was removed.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with three routes wrapped in an error boundary.
frontend/src/assets/staticAssets.ts: Exports static paths for the three background images.
frontend/src/components/AppErrorBoundary: React error boundary that logs errors and shows a refresh prompt on failure.
frontend/src/components/BackgroundAudioP: Empty placeholder for an audio provider component.
frontend/src/components/EnterWebsiteGate: Animated heart-themed entry gate that reveals children after clicking Enter.
frontend/src/components/FullscreenBackgr: Renders a full-screen letterboxed background image with a black overlay.
frontend/src/components/RomanticButton.t: Reusable romantic-styled button supporting default and small sizes.
frontend/src/components/RootLayout.tsx: Basic layout that renders nested routes via Outlet.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshing dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication using AuthClient.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, theme CSS variables, custom fonts, and multiple animation keyframes, forming the global styling foundation.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React root, sets up React Query and Internet Identity providers, and renders the main App with global styles.
frontend/src/pages/FinalPage.tsx: Renders the final page with a background image and a long styled message, ending with a signature element.
frontend/src/pages/IntroPage.tsx: Displays the intro page with timed CTA reveal, styled title/paragraph, and navigation to the proposal page.
frontend/src/pages/ProposalPage.tsx: Shows a proposal question with themed background and a button that navigates to the final page.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Extends Tailwind with custom colors, fonts, radii, keyframes, and animations tied to CSS variables.
project_state.json: Describes project state, pending feature requests, issues, and requirements for styling, assets, and background music.
